Identity.Tooltip: Classes: Champion Melee Infantry Swordsman. "Helot Reforms" Aura: Helot Skirmishers within sight of him gain +2 attack and +1 all armor types. Counters: 2x vs. Spearmen, 1.5x vs. Elephants. Countered by: Archers, Cavalry Spearmen, and Cavalry Archers.
Identity.History: Because Brasidas has sponsored their citizenship in return for service, Helot Skirmishers fight longer and harder for Sparta while within range of him.
